question: Which of the following is not a correct statement?
option1: One liter of cold air will be heavier than one liter of hot air
option2: Bats are blind but can fly in the dark because of echolocation
option3: In human body, Liver stores glucose as glycogen
option4: Foot and mouth disease of cattle is a viral disease
answer: Bats are blind but can fly in the dark because of echolocation
